actionPlan.title: Explore Career Details
actionPlan.desc: Research your top 3-5 career recommendations in depth. Understand daily responsibilities, growth opportunities, and industry trends.

actionPlan.title: Educational Pathway Planning
actionPlan.desc: Research educational requirements, courses, and institutions that align with your career choices. Plan your subject selection for upcoming grades.

actionPlan.title: Professional Networking
actionPlan.desc: Connect with professionals in your areas of interest through LinkedIn, career events, or through family connections. Conduct informational interviews.

actionPlan.title: Gain Experience
actionPlan.desc: Look for internships, job shadowing opportunities, or volunteer work in your fields of interest. Consider joining relevant clubs or competitions.

actionPlan.title: Skill Development
actionPlan.desc: Identify and develop key skills relevant to your top career choices. Take online courses, attend workshops, or start personal projects.
